Perceptor:

Perceptor's spark started to blink, if he didn't get help soon his 
spark would join to... the pit

OOC: I would said the matrix... but a predacon's spark doesn't go to 
MAtrix..

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Switchblade is cloaked, we'll say that Perceptor was 
> hallucinating ;)
> 
> --- Switchblade ---
> 
> Switchblade jumps back as Perceptor lands beside him, "Well well 
> well, what do we have here? He doesn't wait for an answer since he 
> doesn't think that he'll get one. He works quickly to do a brief 
> reprogramation, by changing the Pred chip with a anti-program bug 
> chip to keep the bot unable to act. He begins repairs.
> 
> 
> 
>

> 
> > Charon/DeepFear/Underground/Sharpclaws/Perceptor:

> > Perceptor walked slowly where Swichblade was, he was seriously
